---
title: "Midland City"
---

## Setup

```{r}

library(tidyverse)
library(janitor)
library(readxl)
library(lubridate)
```

## Import 

Same process as before

```{r}
midland <- read_excel("data-raw/MidlandCity.xlsx")

midland |> glimpse()
```

## Select Columns

```{r}
midland_clean <- midland |> select(
  -officer,
  -reportarea,
  -arr_chrg,
  -chrg_cnt,
  -ucr_code,
  -ibr_code,
  -name_id
)

midland_clean
```

## Export
```{r}
midland_clean |> write_rds("data-processed/Midland-City.rds")
```
